Title: Liz Trusss first Downing Street speech as prime minister - BBC News
Info: after returning from balmoral on tuesday, liz truss addressed the uk for the first time from downing street. she pledged to get "britain working again", deal with the energy crisis and make sure people could get gp and nhs services "on a firm footing". live: new pm truss pledges to 'transform britain' © 2022 bbc. the bbc is not responsible for the content of external sites. read about our approach to external linking.
